display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (Apneas with >= 2% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 2% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 2% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrembp2 + hrop2 + hnrbp2 + hnrop2 + carbp2 + carop2 + canbp2 + canop2 + oarbp2 + oarop2 + oanbp2 + oanop2 + marbp2 + marop2 + manrbp2 + manrop2) / slpprdp
